html: Blog Post on Writing an SSG with RX.js on StrongBlog (Jan 19)
I'm giving two talks at the Great Indian Developer Summit!!

GIDS was a blast! Thanks organizers and attendees!! You can find my slides here:
  • Shell tools
  • Node debugging
I'm giving a training at FluentConf on the 19th and 20th. I'll be at the conference the 21st & 22nd as well so if you're there, say hi!

I'm at doing a workshop on Encrypted Communication at HOPE on the 21st.
Come say hi!!
